report.title: overdueList
report.sql: select member.last_name ,member.first_name ,member.address ,member.home_phone ,member.work_phone ,member.email ,biblio_copy.barcode_nmbr ,biblio.title ,biblio.author ,biblio_status_dm.description ,biblio_copy.status_begin_dt ,biblio_copy.due_back_dt ,greatest(0,to_days(sysdate()) - to_days(biblio_copy.due_back_dt)) days_late from biblio, biblio_copy, member, biblio_status_dm where biblio.bibid = biblio_copy.bibid and biblio_copy.mbrid = member.mbrid and biblio_copy.status_cd = biblio_status_dm.code and greatest(0,to_days(sysdate()) - to_days(biblio_copy.due_back_dt)) > 0
